Text: No, as a matter of fact, its NOT his/her movie. Its other peoples movies that he/she edited. Fan edits are fucking retarded. Granted, the first AVP was a shitty, terrible movie... but its still someone elses movie. Wanna make a movie? Make your own, quit ripping off other peoples work. Its practically plagiarism.

Are you serious Captain? This is like plagiarism?! Someone should call the cops! Plagiarism is practically STEALING! I hope Wraith paid the movie company for doing this. Or else they might suffer monetarily. Shame on Wraith for editing a movie into something watchable!
Well they failed, because it is still crap...
Pretty lol taking about plagiarism and stealing on tpb. For me this is about as legal you can get :)
